subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: After tying Portugal on Sunday in hot and humid conditions, the American players drank protein shakes, took ice baths, got massages and wore compression pants on to the flight back their Cup base.
snippet: After tying Portugal on Sunday in hot and humid conditions, the American players drank protein shakes, took ice baths, got massages and wore compression pants on to the flight back their Cup base.
